data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nafría, Juan Manuel Nieto, Ortego, Jaime, Brown, Paul A., López Ciruelos, Sara I., Durante, M. Pilar Mier (2019): Aphis (Hemiptera, Aphididae) species living on Baccharis (Asteraceae) in southern South America, with description of three new species. Zootaxa 4656 (1): 153-167, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4656.1.8|39 occurrences
